# Golu Singh - Full Stack Developer

## About Me
I am a Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating innovative and user-friendly web applications. With expertise in React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet the needs of my clients. My goal is to create engaging and interactive experiences that provide value to users and help businesses succeed.

## Skills
- **Programming Languages**: C, Java, PHP, Node.js
- **Database & Design**: SQL, MongoDB, Figma, Photopea
- **Web Technologies**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap
- **Frameworks**: Next.js, Express.js, Nest js, React.js
- **Tools**: Git, Docker, Postman, Google Cloud, Cursor, Miro

## Experience
- **Software Engineer** at Vis Network Pvt. Ltd. (Oct 2024 - Present)
- **Web Developer Intern** at Wooble Software Pvt. Ltd. (Oct 2023 - May 2024)
- **Open Source Contributor** at Craftfosslabs (2025 - Present)

## Projects
- **CraftfossLabs**: Open-source platform built on Next.js with automated blog and admin panel. [View](http://craftfosslabs.com/)
- **Games Platform**: Scalable game hosting platform built with React.js. [View](https://games.craftfosslabs.com/)
- **Tools For Professional Developers**: Productivity tools suite including Code Share, Finance Planner, and Task Manager. [View](https://tools.craftfosslabs.com/)
- **Study Notion**: EdTech platform for tracking academic progress. [View](https://pathshala-ruby.vercel.app/)
